title: Parasite Eve 2 [ENG/RUS] (2000) PC
description:
RELEASE DATE: August 25, 2000
GENRE: Survival horror, Action, 3rd Person, RPG
DEVELOPER: SquareSoft (Square Enix)
PUBLISHER: --

PLATFORM: PC
VERSION: 1.0
PUBLICATION TYPE: Unofficial
TABLET: Not required

LANGUAGE INTERFACE: English / Russian
LANGUAGE SUBTITLE:  English / Russian 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Description:

Second part of the already well-known survival horror game with rpg dyes in real time, so who watched the 1st part already know.
Three years after the chaos of Manhattan history is repeating itself. Aya has entered a secret security force of the United States, which is responsible for the destruction of the few NMC (monsters mitochondrial) left after the death of the powerful Eve. But something strange happens, when all were terminated for CMN by a wave of strikes them stronger than ever U.S. cities. Aya must end this situation as soon as possible, outbreaks of NMC are getting stronger, what happens?

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Installation:

1. Mount the disk image program Daemon Tools or similar supporting mount a virtual drive disk image format iso.
2. Install the game, following the instructions of the installation.
3. Play!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

F.A.Q.

Q: The game does not start - a dark screen and the error "Missing framebuffer object extension!".
A: Go to Settings >> Video option "Visual mode" >> expose value Ã¢â€žâ€“1.

Q: The game does not start - a dark screen and the error "No WGL extensions!"
A: Try running the game settings v1.7

Q: Do not open settings / hang in the process.
A: Open the Task Manager on Windows >> RMB "Parasite Eve II-Options" >> "to restart the process."

Q: During the transition between the door schedule can not be played smoothly.
A: This minor problem can be solved by changing the "Video Options".

Q: During the dialogues, subtitles, can not hear the speech of the characters.
A: This is normal. So the developers intended.

Q: Does the gamepad (joystick)?
A: Yes, supported.

Q: Does the Windows 10?
A: No, not supported
